source: TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_000<tab>Another anima glass? I could swear I saw you using the one I gave you not long ago.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_000「」を失くしたのですか？
……おや、あなたの手元にあるようですね！

source: TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_001<tab>If they were more easily crafted I would gladly offer you another, but sadly that is not the case. That said, you are more than welcome to a replacement when you are truly in need.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_001もし失くしてしまったら、俺に言ってください！
新しい「」を用意いたします。
TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_010<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C6D01 /var>」を失くされたのですか？

source: TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_011<tab>No need to fret. I have prepared another as a safety precaution. With so much at stake, one can never be too careful.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_011心配せずとも、いくつも予備を用意してありますよ！
どうぞ、新たなを受け取ってください。

source: TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_020<tab>If anything should happen to it, pray come and speak with me. I shall see to having another prepared for you.
target: TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_020<tab>失くしてしまったら、また俺に言ってください！

source: TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_030<tab>Are you certain? I imagine tracking the anima's progress will be difficult without it.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_030そうですか……とても便利な道具なので、
是非とも使っていただきたいのですが……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_031<tab>Well, let me know should you change your mind.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL500GETGLASSAGAIN_00374_ARDASHIR_000_031今は無くてもいいかもしれませんが、
必要になったら、俺に言ってくださいね！
